line_1: Swear how I love thee dearly:
line_2: Till the silent moon shine clearly;

line_1: Thy Person I love so dearly
line_2: And go home in the Morning early.

line_1: And parents kind who love us dearly; —
line_2: And cheerful pastime, late and early,

line_1: The Lass I Love so dearly.
The Lass I Love so dearly.
line_2: And Moggey's Bed so near me:
